statements: SELECT * FROM WasteManagementFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE utilization < 50;
SELECT facility_id, location, last_update FROM WasteManagementFacilities ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT facility_name AS Name, capacity AS Capacity FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE capacity > 100 AND utilization < 50 ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE utilization > 75;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE facility_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT facility_id, utilization, utilization*100/capacity AS utilization_percentage FROM WasteManagementFacilities ORDER BY capacity DESC, utilization_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, utilization_rate FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE utilization_rate > 0.5;
SELECT facility_name, utilization_rate, capacity FROM WasteManagementFacilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT report_date, waste_type, total_waste_collected FROM FacilityReports WHERE total_waste_collected > total_waste_generated;
SELECT f.facility_name, r.total_waste_generated FROM WasteManagementFacilities f JOIN FacilityReports r ON f.facility_id = r.facility_id;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM FacilityReports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY total_waste_generated DESC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity, utilization_rate FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, utilization_rate FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY utilization_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM FacilityReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM WasteFacility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacility ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM WasteFacility WHERE utilization < 0.5;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacility WHERE location LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT facility_name, capacity, utilization FROM WasteFacility ORDER BY utilization DESC, capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacility WHERE facility_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY facility_id ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM WasteFacility WHERE utilization > 0.5 ORDER BY utilization DESC, facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM WasteFacility GROUP BY facility_name, location ORDER BY total_capacity DESC;

SELECT w.facility_name, c.collection_day, c.collection_time FROM WasteFacility w JOIN CollectionSchedule c ON w.facility_id = c.facility_id WHERE c.collection_day = 'Monday' AND c.collection_time > '08:00:00' ORDER BY w.facility_name ASC, c.collection_time ASC;
SELECT wb.bin_type, SUM(wb.current_level) AS total_level FROM WasteBin wb JOIN CollectionSchedule c ON wb.bin_id = c.bin_id GROUP BY wb.bin_type ORDER BY total_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM WasteManagementFacilities;
SELECT * FROM CollectionReports ORDER BY collected_amount DESC;
SELECT facility_name, utilization_percentage FROM WasteManagementFacilities JOIN UtilizationReports ON WasteManagementFacilities.facility_id = UtilizationReports.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM CollectionReports WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, capacity FROM WasteManagementFacilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, utilization FROM WasteManagementFacilities ORDER BY utilization DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CollectionReports WHERE collected_amount < 5000 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT facility_id, report_date, utilization_percentage FROM UtilizationReports WHERE utilization_percentage > 80;
SELECT * FROM waste_facility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facility ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM waste_facility WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_bin WHERE utilization < 0.5;
SELECT bin_type, capacity, utilization FROM waste_bin WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_facility
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facility ORDER BY facility_name ASC
SELECT facility_name, capacity, utilization FROM waste_facility WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY utilization DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_bin WHERE bin_type='Recycling'
SELECT bin_id, capacity FROM waste_bin WHERE utilization < 0.5 ORDER BY bin_id
